items.title: Graston Technique®
items.subtitle: Full-Stack Marketing & Systems Transformation
items.summary: Complete marketing + technology transformation: internal instructor dashboard, AI support assistant, CRM automation, and e‑commerce innovation.
items.problem: Fragmented systems, manual admin work, low visibility into events and sales.
items.solution: Unified ecosystem on WP + LearnDash + FluentCRM; AI support; 400+ workflows; 'Buy Now, Choose Later' checkout.
items.results: Automated, efficient, data-driven engine re-establishing brand authority and growth.

items.title: Black Letter Legal
items.subtitle: High-Conversion B2B Lead Generation
items.summary: Multi-channel strategy with authoritative content, LinkedIn engine, and CRM nurturing.
items.problem: Crowded market, lacking authority and nurturing.
items.solution: SEO overhaul, LinkedIn system, and automated scoring + segments.
items.results: Predictable client acquisition with strong conversion lifts.

items.title: Gomez Craft Barbecue
items.subtitle: Restaurant Brand Launch & Digital Presence
items.summary: Full brand identity, custom mobile ordering, and local SEO.
items.problem: New entrant needed powerful brand + digital.
items.results: Cohesive strategy that rapidly grew orders and community.
